addAuthorizedMarketplace(address).details: Only admin can authorize marketplaces to create escrows on behalf of buyers

params.marketplace: Address of marketplace contract to authorize

cancelEscrow(uint256).details: Only buyer can cancel, only before seller delivers

confirmAssetReceived(uint256).details: Triggers immediate release of funds to seller

params.buyer: Address of the asset buyer (explicitly passed for marketplace integrations)
params.metadataURI: IPFS link to full asset metadata

markAssetDelivered(uint256).details: Called after seller transfers credentials/access off-chain

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

releaseEscrow(uint256).details: Can be called by anyone after conditions are met

removeAuthorizedMarketplace(address).details: Only admin can remove marketplace authorization

params.marketplace: Address of marketplace contract to deauthorize

params.amount: Amount to award (can be partial split)

authorizedMarketplaces(address).notice: Authorized marketplace contracts that can create escrows on behalf of buyers

buyerEscrows(address,uint256).notice: Buyer address => array of escrow IDs

confirmAssetReceived(uint256).notice: Buyer confirms asset received and working

createEscrow(address,address,uint8,uint2.notice: Create a new escrow for digital asset purchase

escrowMetadata(uint256).notice: Mapping from escrow ID to metadata URI

escrows(uint256).notice: Mapping from escrow ID to escrow data

openDispute(uint256,string).notice: Open a dispute on an escrow

sellerEscrows(address,uint256).notice: Seller address => array of escrow IDs
